definitions: A card that can be used to represent any other card in a game.
A character that can be substituted for any of a class of characters in a search or other operation.
A competitor or team that is admitted to a tournament or competition despite not having qualified through the usual process.
examples: In poker, the joker can be a wildcard.
Use an asterisk as a wildcard to find all files.
His recovery was a wildcard in their plans.
She entered the tennis tournament as a wildcard.
